review:
I loved this movies.. I. Like such unusual movies... It's nowhere near being a horror movie, yet this is a kind of movie that's suited for night time!!
I would switch off the light at night, open my laptop and watch such movies in complete silence with a peg of brandy!!
I call such movies "nasheele movies"
A surprisingly well made movie where all the characters are given enough depth and reality. Acting could be better though. But overall a good watch

Very ordinary story and typical ending to story with average performances.Seems like time waste watching it even on television.
Amazed how rating is so much for such movie.
Esha Deol's voice is dubbed by some other artist.  The whole movie gives an impression of a C grade movie with a very dark and depressing story line.  All the actors look very artificial
nothing too great. good to watch it once. amisha patel looks too good.
Ameesha is superb looking so beautiful
Every man has two women in their own life.
